title: Remote online notarizations (RON)
personalDataVerified: Signer name, video session ID, notary name, notary commission number, electronic journal entry, document type, session date/time, RON platform name
personalDataVisible: Notary commission status (active/expired/revoked). Video recording availability (if authorized). Link to RON platform and state notary database (attorneys and title companies, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake RON certifications in electronic notarizations. Domain binding verifies RON platform and notary legitimacy. COVID-19 pandemic accelerated RON adoption for contactless transactions. Electronic journal verification for audit trails. Prevents remote notary fraud through tamper-evident records. Audio/video recording authentication proves signer identity verification. Critical for remote transactions where electronic notarization replaces in-person notarization with equivalent legal validity.
